name: ems-web-app-loader
author: Chris Spence (https://educationalmediasolutions.com)
description: The embedded angular.io component and service expose an interface for rendering a modal overlay and loader animation during server transactions.

scripts.publish-npm: git add -A . && git commit --allow-empty -m 'prepublish npm package' && npm version patch && ng build loader && cd dist && npm publish
